Name: The Break-In!
desc: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Secret Rendezvous
desc: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Assault on NORAD
desc: Forced Response: After placing threat here during step 1 of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 2 threat here or put the top card of their deck into play facd down, engaged with them as a Drone minion.

Name: Countdown to Oblivion
desc: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
